name: Time Recoil
overview: Time Recoil is a top-down shooter where you kill to slow time, experience amazing slow motion gunfights, and trigger spectacular special moves. Your mission is to save the world from Mr. Time, a time manipulating mad scientist turned evil dictator. Shoot, dodge, and dash through his evil empire guns blazing and unleash your super powers! Kill to slow time - every enemy you kill will grant you more time in slow motion. Earn special moves: The longer your kill-combo, the more powerful your ability. Travel into the past with wormholes and finally kill Mr. Time! Try to earn all the stars and climb the leaderboards in Time Attack mode.
